title: CQRS_Banking_System
description: A banking system powered by CQRS & Event Sourcing where every transaction is an immutable Kafka event, Quartz automates event scheduling, and read models keep queries blazing fast.

title: Spring_Kafka_Job_Scheduler
description: Enterprise-ready demonstration of a Spring Boot 'Worker Queue & Job Scheduler' application using Apache Kafka and Quartz, showcasing scalable job orchestration patterns, with Postgres as the local database server.

title: SpringBoot_Observability_DashBoard
description: Observabilty Dashboard service built with SpringBoot, Micrometer & Prometheus for monitoring metrics.

title: Spring_Lucene_Search_Engine
description: A Document Search Engine & Information Retrieval System implemented in SpringBoot & Apache Lucene.

title: WellRESTed
description: An enterprise grade REST API with HATEOAS support, REST Client, SOAP communication and SOAP Client enabled.

title: SpringBoot_BookStore_GraphQL
description: A SpringBoot book-store & library service API implemented in GraphQL.
